price: Na sitaki kwao riziki, wala sitaki wanilishe.Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu ndiye Mwenye kuruzuku, Mwenye nguvu, Madhubuti.
arabic: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنۡهُم مِّن رِّزۡقٖ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطۡعِمُونِ
footnotes: Sitaki kwao riziki, kwani Mimi si mhitaji kwa walimwengu wote; wala sitaki wanilishe, kwani Mimi ndiye ninaye lisha, wala silishwi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: mā urīdu min'hum min riz'qin wamā urīdu an yuṭ'ʿimūni
